search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Skilljar (skilljar.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for Skilljar's pricing page is: [https://www.skilljar.com/lms-pricing/](https://www.skilljar.com/lms-pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Product

Skilljar External LMS

Build an on-brand Academy to help your customers and partners grow their skills and see the value of your product faster. Explore what a personalized learning destination can do for you.

[Product Overview](https://www.skilljar.com/product-overview)

[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/661e6b7bec8cca0068f1d52b_product%20overview%20img.png)](https://www.skilljar.com/product-overview)

[Design learner experiences → On-demand or instructor-led courses, lessons, paths, single-sign-on, certifications](https://www.skilljar.com/product-overview#design)

[Monetize training content → Payment integrations, subscriptions, training credits, promo codes](https://www.skilljar.com/product-overview#monetize)

[Deliver business impact → Salesforce integration, native reports, industry benchmarks, automation, APIs](https://www.skilljar.com/product-overview#deliver)

[Take product tour](https://www.skilljar.com/lms-online-demo)

Industries

[Tech & Software Train customers, partners, and users ![Image 2: A woman sitting on a couch next to a man on a laptop.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/661fb800e30002aaf2bc085f_software%20header%20img%20(3).png)](https://www.skilljar.com/industries/software)[Healthcare Train physicians, clinicians, and researchers ![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/66185b67e4eb203dee165da0_healthcare.png)](https://www.skilljar.com/industries/healthcare)[Manufacturing Train distributors, resellers, and installers ![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/66185b3d28cea8d9b7e56400_manufacturing.png)](https://www.skilljar.com/industries/manufacturing)

Customers

[Customer Spotlight Alarm.com scaled their partner training program exponentially and drove an 80% increase in YoY certification maintenance. ![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/6618524a62cf843f524b27d0_alarm.com%20customer.jpg) ![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/6618537762cf843f524c52a1_alarm.com%20logo.svg) 80% Increase in YoY certification maintenance](https://www.skilljar.com/case-studies/alarm-com)[Customer Stories See how hundreds of companies onboard, engage, and retain customers with Skilljar. ![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/66185803dba67c5fcf68ac42_customer%20stories.png)](https://www.skilljar.com/customers)[Academy Inspiration Explore on-brand Academies from leading customer education teams.](https://www.skilljar.com/academy-inspiration)

By clicking “Accept All Cookies”, you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. [Privacy Policy](https://www.skilljar.com/privacy/)

Accept All Cookies

Cookies Settings

![Image 13: Skilljar Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/1f24799a-4971-40c6-a063-b02c5542fd53/018f07a2-7115-7117-ae03-e25d0277790b/56fc4384-f307-4925-bb76-864b566b364a/SkillJar-Logo-DarkBlue.png)

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies)

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

### Cookie List

Extend your plan with Add-Ons

for 5 languages

LearnExperts

Leverage AI to create and publish courses and content directly to Skilljar that’s powered by [LearnExperts](https://learnexperts.ai/)

Used by top education teams
---------------------------

[![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/67005bf67d84906ad47ecb32_svgexport-1.svg)](https://www.g2.com/products/skilljar-customer-education-platform/reviews)

"A customizable tool that makes it easy for our customers to get trained. The leap forward in customer training that Skilljar allowed was customizing the interface for our users. The API connections pull data for each user, so we can send them to the right landing page, and the most appropriate training will be highlighted on those pages. This wasn't possible with our previous system.”

—VP, Product Education, Mid-Market

### FAQs

What is an active user?

An active user is someone who consumes or interacts with a lesson in your Academy. We estimate active users annually, and track actual usage monthly. As you grow, the cost per active user decreases. For example, if you estimate 5,000 active users annually and actually have 100 in January and 400 in February, you'll have 4,500 active users left for the rest of the year.

Do I pay for users that log into my Academy?

No, you only pay for _active_ users, users who register for and consume content with their email address.

How much is each active user?

We offer tiered pricing—the more active users you have, the lower the cost per user. Contact our Sales team for specific details.

How can I estimate my active users?

If you have a current Learning Management System, check your monthly unique logged-in learners. If you’re new to LMS, our Sales team can provide some benchmarks to estimate based on your use case for your Academy. For example, if your Academy is focused on onboarding new customers, we recommend looking at how many new customers you’re onboarding per month and applying a percentage you want to reach with training. If you have a Help Center, this can be another helpful proxy to understand the number of customers looking for educational content.

Is there a cap on active users per month?

No, you have a yearly allocation. For example, let’s say you estimate 5,000 annual active users. If you have 100 active users in January and 400 active users in February, you will have 4,500 active users remaining for the year.

Is a user counted more than once if they log in multiple times in a month?

No, a user is only counted once per month, even if they log in and consume content multiple times. For example, if a user views content in your Academy everyday of the year, they are considered 12 active users against your annual bucket of active users.

Can I add additional active users at any time?

Yes, reach out to your Account Manager to add more active users.

What is the difference between each Skilljar pricing plan?

Plans differ in the number of Academy sites, admin role types, and integrations. If you sell your courses, you may want to consider upgrading to Professional or Enterprise for more currencies and access to our Content Syndication feature to embed your courses in other LMSs.

What integrations do you offer?

We offer integrations with the most common tools in your tech stack, such as Salesforce, Gainsight, Zoom, Credly, Stripe and Zendesk. See the full list [here](https://www.skilljar.com/integrations).

What can I expect during a demo or pricing call with your Sales team?

Our team will walk you through Skilljar’s features, learn about your education program goals, and answer your questions.

What is the difference between the Skilljar Dashboard, an Academy site, a Test Academy, and a Sandbox Org?

*   Skilljar Dashboard: The back-end Learning Management System your education team uses to manage learning content, enroll students and see analytics
*   Academy Site: The front-end learner experience where your learners access your content (e.g., academy.company.com)
*   Test Academy: A test Academy site so you can preview courses or theming before going live (e.g. test-company.skilljar.com)
*   Sandbox Org: A separate Skilljar Dashboard environment to test integrations and data connectors without affecting your Academy site.

What are the various administrative roles that come with each plan?

We offer 14 admin roles. Our Essentials plan includes any 6 roles, and Professional or Enterprise plans include all roles. You can view [detailed permissions for each in our Help Center.](https://support.skilljar.com/hc/en-us/articles/18631929431699-Skilljar-Dashboard-Roles-and-Permissions)

What is Content Syndication?

Skilljar’s Content Syndication allows you to create and host your courses in Skilljar, then distribute them directly to any LMS your customers use, all while retaining full ownership and control. With live updates and comprehensive analytics, you can deliver a consistent and engaging learning experience for all users.

What is External Management?

Skilljar’s External Management is a secure way to delegate student management without giving external users access to your back-end dashboard. Skilljar admin can assign external "Student Managers" who can add new students, enroll them in specified content, and track their progress—directly from your branded Academy. This capability allows you to offload administrative tasks while maintaining complete control over what Student Managers can do.

What are Actions and Automations?

Skilljar Actions help you create custom workflows that run themselves so you can spend less time on manual tasks. Actions give you the ability to automate common learner management tasks. Using actions, you can automatically add a learner to a group, remove a learner from a group, or enroll a learner in any course.

![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/661e8f771ff1af64b7c1fc7d_grid%20pattern.svg)![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/661e8f771ff1af64b7c1fc7d_grid%20pattern.svg)![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/661e8f771ff1af64b7c1fc7d_grid%20pattern.svg)![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f2e85a59750ccb710adbf3/661e8f771ff1af64b7c1fc7d_grid%20pattern.svg)

We're here to help
------------------

Not ready to talk yet? Take Skilljar for a spin yourself.
---------------------------------------------------------

Learn about Skilljar's cost and LMS pricing structure to see how we can best fit your organization's needs. Find SaaS learning management system pricing here.
